item.description:
Support a wonderful cause while socializing at the same time. Project Smile is an organization that brings stuffed animals, books, and other gifts to police and fire departments in six states for children who are victims of traumatic situations.

At this annual fundraiser you will hear inspiring stories, get to bid on affordable auction items (silent and live), and enjoy great music and food.

Special Guest Speaker: Karen Swensen, Emmy Ward Winning Anchor, New England Cable News
Special Guest: Miss Massachusetts

MEET AT THE REGISTRATION TABLE AT 6:30 PM. Look for Jacki wearing a meetup badge. If you arrive after 6:30 pm, look for us inside the function room. Should be easy to find us.

Donation is $10 per person

Some of you have asked if you could bring your stuffed animals and other items to donate to this event. It is preferred that you contact the founder directly to arrange a drop off: Please email Catherine Pisacane cpisacane@projectsmile.org
For more information about donations and the organization: http://www.projectsmi...
item.name: Project Smile Fundraiser Cocktail Party
